description:
After Lina rebuilds the castle, the Golden Dragons confess their doubts in her ability to complete the important mission. She better not let it bother her - Almayce is about to attack!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Peace Conference? This Is the Dragon Shrine?
Un entretien paisible ? C`est ça, le temple des dragons ?
Wahei Kaidan? Kore ga Dragon no Shinden ka?
和平会談? これがドラゴンの神殿か?
